about_the_game:
THE GAME CONTAINS FLASHING LIGHTS AND VISUAL EFFECTS (E.G., CAMERA FLASH SIMULATIONS) THAT MAY CAUSE DISCOMFORT OR SEIZURES FOR PEOPLE SENSITIVE TO LIGHT FLASHING OR WITH PHOTOEPILEPSY. IT IS ADVISED TO EXERCISE CAUTION DURING PLAY AND CONSIDER TRYING THE DEMO BEFORE PURCHASING.

Dive into the dark, claustrophobic world of HorrorCore: Maze and Pools of Horror with the free DEMO! This is an introduction to the full game, offering the first complete chapter and a taste of the atmosphere that will force you to face terrifying mazes and mysterious pools.

The Demo Includes:

  • First Full Chapter – Step into a world full of puzzles, fear, and unexpected events. Traverse dark corridors where every step could lead to danger.

  • Intro Sequence – Get to know the story and the chilling introduction that will take you to the edge of madness.

  • Graphics Settings – Customize the game for your system to get the best possible experience by adjusting the graphics to your needs.

  • Voice Acting – Immerse yourself further with fully recorded voice acting that adds realism and emotion to the story.

  • Language Versions – The game is available in multiple languages, so you can enjoy it in your preferred language.

Experience the psychological horror in this free DEMO version, and get ready for the full release that expands this world with new levels, characters, and even more terrifying challenges.

THE GAME CONTAINS FLASHING LIGHTS AND VISUAL EFFECTS (E.G., CAMERA FLASH SIMULATIONS) THAT MAY CAUSE DISCOMFORT OR SEIZURES FOR PEOPLE SENSITIVE TO LIGHT FLASHING OR WITH PHOTOEPILEPSY. IT IS ADVISED TO EXERCISE CAUTION DURING PLAY AND CONSIDER TRYING THE DEMO BEFORE PURCHASING.

Dive into the dark, claustrophobic world of HorrorCore: Maze and Pools of Horror with the free DEMO! This is an introduction to the full game, offering the first complete chapter and a taste of the atmosphere that will force you to face terrifying mazes and mysterious pools.

The Demo Includes:

  • First Full Chapter – Step into a world full of puzzles, fear, and unexpected events. Traverse dark corridors where every step could lead to danger.

  • Intro Sequence – Get to know the story and the chilling introduction that will take you to the edge of madness.

  • Graphics Settings – Customize the game for your system to get the best possible experience by adjusting the graphics to your needs.

  • Voice Acting – Immerse yourself further with fully recorded voice acting that adds realism and emotion to the story.

  • Language Versions – The game is available in multiple languages, so you can enjoy it in your preferred language.

Experience the psychological horror in this free DEMO version, and get ready for the full release that expands this world with new levels, characters, and even more terrifying challenges.

fullgame.name: HorrorCore: Maze and Pools of Horror

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux 64 bits
  • Processor: Core i3 / AMD FX 2.4Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 / Nvidia GTX 460 / AMD Radeon HD 5750 / Intel HD 630 / GTX 750
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: But, please check always demo. THE GAME CONTAINS FLASHING LIGHTS AND VISUAL EFFECTS (E.G., CAMERA FLASH SIMULATIONS) THAT MAY CAUSE DISCOMFORT OR SEIZURES FOR PEOPLE SENSITIVE TO LIGHT FLASHING OR WITH PHOTOEPILEPSY. IT IS ADVISED TO EXERCISE CAUTION DURING PLAY AND CONSIDER TRYING THE DEMO BEFORE PURCHASING.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 64 bits
  • Processor: Core i5 / Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 / GTX 3060 Ti / Nvidia GTX 680 / AMD Radeon RX 580 / Intel Xe-HPG
  • Additional Notes: But, please check always demo.
